history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I did not hear the name of the system. Could you repeat it?

TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit please.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER I'm going to the airport.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER Forbes and Craig
TTS Okay, leaving from forbes-craig apartments. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER in an hour from now
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:34 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Okay.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 9 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to Forbes avenue at Craig St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER done
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the 28X to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. It will depart at 11:57am. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER repeat
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the 28X to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. It will depart at 11:57am. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 9 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to Forbes avenue at Craig St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the 28X to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. It will depart at 12:27pm. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER It's okay.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER finished
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER no.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
